original: intros a n H. split. - intros H0. unfold LindenbaumConstruction. exists (S n). apply H0. - intros [m H0]. induction m. ++ simpl in H0. contradiction. ++ simpl in H0. simpl. destruct H0 as [H1 | [H1 H2]]. * left. apply IHm. apply H1. * right. split. { apply H1. } { apply H2. }
